title.rendered: Now Hiring + Buy Two Get One FREE Melissa & Doug Activity Pads

content.rendered:
We’re Hiring!

Gottwals Books is looking to hire store associates. Please describe your availability upon e-mailing your resume. E-mail resumes to: office@gottwalsbooks.com.

Buy Two Melissa & Doug Activity Pads and Get One FREE

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Walls of Books #12

We are taking a lot of calls from people wanting to open their own used bookstores. We are pricing and packing inventory for Store #12. We will reveal the location in our next newsletter!
